article.title: Northrop Grumman Wins Bid to Integrate Electronic Travel Service
article.author: Henry Kenyon
article.text: Northrop Grumman CorporationÂ has been awarded a task order from the Government Accountability Office (GAO) to support the office's integration to the GovTrip electronic travel service. The GovTrip integration will help the GAO increase efficiency and reduce travel costs. Work on the task order will last for four years and will take place in Fairfax, Virginia.
